desc: Relieve Pain, Stress, Tension, and Soothe Tired and Achy Muscles and Joints With a 100% Non-Toxic Hot and Cold Pack. Rice-filled, moist heat, microwave heating pads.

layout.text: Hold and Cold Aromatherapy Rice Packs to Soothe Aches and Pains, Relieve Pain, Stress and Tension -- 100% non-toxic!
